name: ELASH
description: You've been hired to defend ELASH, the kingdom that you don't have any relation with. The money that the King promised you was more than enough to drive you defending it from Ashley's minions.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: I5 6400/Ryzen 5 1600 or above Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1060(6GB)/RX 580 or above DirectX: Version 12 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Motherboard integrated Additional Notes: Required VR Headset Currently Supported: [VIVE] Future: [Oculus & Mixed Reality]
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: I7 7700/Ryzen 7 1700 or above Memory: 12 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1080/Vega 56 or above DirectX: Version 12 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Motherboard integrated Additional Notes: Required VR Headset Currently Supported: [VIVE] Future: [Oculus] & Mixed Reality
